I know the Van of the month seems to struggle on the forum these days, Is it done ?

Andy

I hope not!

I am sure there are heaps of part finished vans out there waiting for there turn to be judged by the masses, but there owners don't feel comfortable just yet to put them forward......I know I have one that falls into that category.

Maybe we need to change things up a bit and have a few months of different categories......interior of the month, rat of the month, cal look of the month, can't believe its still on the road of the month, longest running project of the month.........

Any other suggestions?
Longest project sounds like my kinda category! Or most controversial mod! Yep change would be good me thinks!!
